scripts.pwa-generate-icons: cd static && pwa-asset-generator ./favicon-512.png --path-override="" --manifest ./manifest.json --type png --icon-only --favicon --index ../src/icons.html --padding "0" && npm run pwa-generate-links
scripts.pwa-generate-splash: cd static/splash && pwa-asset-generator ../inneressence.png --path-override="/splash" --manifest ../manifest.json --type png --splash-only --favicon --index ../../src/icons.html --padding "0" && npm run pwa-generate-links
scripts.pwa-generate-splash-dark: cd static/splash && pwa-asset-generator ../inneressence-dark.png --path-override="/splash" --dark-mode --background "black" --manifest ../manifest.json --type png --splash-only --favicon --index ../../src/icons.html --padding "0" && npm run pwa-generate-links
scripts.pwa-generate: npm run pwa-generate-icons && npm run pwa-generate-splash && npm run pwa-generate-splash-dark
